description:
OpenStack version: Icehouse

Setup: 3-node, namely Controller, Compute and Network

Issue: cannot run "nova shelve-offload <server>" command

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create an instance.
2. Verify instance is running/active: nova list
3. Run command: nova shelve <server>
4. Verify instance: nova list
5. Note that the instance is in "SHELVED_OFFLOADED" state.
6. Run command: nova shelve-offload <server>
7. Note the error.

root@Controller:/home/guest# nova boot --image cirros-0.3.3 --flavor 1 --nic net-id=75375f9b-0f26-4e1a-aedc-24457192f265 vm-1
+--------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| Property                             | Value                                               |
+--------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
| OS-DCF:diskConfig                    | MANUAL                                              |
| OS-EXT-AZ:availability_zone          | nova                                                |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:host                 | -                                                   |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:hypervisor_hostname  | -                                                   |
| OS-EXT-SRV-ATTR:instance_name        | instance-00000055                                   |
| OS-EXT-STS:power_state               | 0                                                   |
| OS-EXT-STS:task_state                | scheduling                                          |
| OS-EXT-STS:vm_state                  | building                                            |
| OS-SRV-USG:launched_at               | -                                                   |
| OS-SRV-USG:terminated_at             | -                                                   |
| accessIPv4                           |                                                     |
| accessIPv6                           |                                                     |
| adminPass                            | SMaVcJpBZh2u                                        |
| config_drive                         |                                                     |
| created                              | 2014-09-11T17:41:11Z                                |
| flavor                               | m1.tiny (1)                                         |
| hostId                               |                                                     |
| id                                   | d2fa95b3-a4da-43a3-bc12-e0fe7f9bdc34                |
| image                                | cirros-0.3.3 (4e164335-1fc6-4702-b2c6-9a87327a8b90) |
| key_name                             | -                                                   |
| metadata                             | {}                                                  |
| name                                 | vm-1                                                |
| os-extended-volumes:volumes_attached | []                                                  |
| progress                             | 0                                                   |
| security_groups                      | default                                             |
| status                               | BUILD                                               |
| tenant_id                            | 73a095bf078443c9b340d871deaabcc3                    |
| updated                              | 2014-09-11T17:41:11Z                                |
| user_id                              | 77bdd3f911744f72af7038d40d722439                    |
+--------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova list
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
| ID                                   | Name | Status | Task State | Power State | Networks            |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
| d2fa95b3-a4da-43a3-bc12-e0fe7f9bdc34 | vm-1 | ACTIVE | -          | Running     | int-net=172.16.1.60 |
+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova shelve vm-1
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova list
+--------------------------------------+------+-------------------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
| ID                                   | Name | Status            | Task State | Power State | Networks            |
+--------------------------------------+------+-------------------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
| d2fa95b3-a4da-43a3-bc12-e0fe7f9bdc34 | vm-1 | SHELVED_OFFLOADED | -          | Shutdown    | int-net=172.16.1.60 |
+--------------------------------------+------+-------------------+------------+-------------+---------------------+
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova help shelve-offload
usage: nova shelve-offload <server>

Remove a shelved server from the compute node.

Positional arguments:
  <server>  Name or ID of server.
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova shelve-offload vm-1
ERROR: Cannot 'shelveOffload' while instance is in vm_state shelved_offloaded (HTTP 409) (Request-ID: req-4b03df0c-16f6-4e93-a89d-10a5bfa3d987)
title: Cannot run 'nova shelve-offload' command

comments.content:
OpenStack version: Icehouse

Setup: 3-node, namely Controller, Compute and Network

Issue: cannot run "nova shelve-offload <server>" command

Steps to reproduce:
1. Create an instance.
2. Verify instance is running/active: nova list
3. Run command: nova shelve <server>
4. Verify instance: nova list
5. Note that the instance is in "SHELVED_OFFLOADED" state.
6. Run command: nova shelve-offload <server>
7. Note the error.

root@Controller:/home/guest# nova boot --image cirros-0.3.3 --flavor 1 --nic net-id=75375f9b-0f26-4e1a-aedc-24457192f265 vm-1
+--------------------------------------+-----------------------------------------------------+

+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------+

+--------------------------------------+------+--------+------------+-------------+---------------------+

usage: nova shelve-offload <server>

Remove a shelved server from the compute node.

Positional arguments:
  <server>  Name or ID of server.
root@Controller:/home/guest# nova shelve-offload vm-1
ERROR: Cannot 'shelveOffload' while instance is in vm_state shelved_offloaded (HTTP 409) (Request-ID: req-4b03df0c-16f6-4e93-a89d-10a5bfa3d987)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dannchoi

comments.content: If you have nova logs, those would be helpful to figure out what's failing on the back end
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~sdague

comments.content:
In nova.conf, you can specify 'shelved_offload_time' parameter.

--------------------------------------------------------------
# Time in seconds before a shelved instance is eligible for
# removing from a host.  -1 never offload, 0 offload when
# shelved (integer value)
#shelved_offload_time=0
--------------------------------------------------------------


if 'shelved_offload_time' is set to more than 0, VM state becomes 'SHELVED' state when shelve operation is performed.
After 'shelved_offload_time'(For example, 180) seconds, VM state becomes 'SHELVED_OFFLOADED' automatically.

When VM state is 'SHELVED', you can perform 'nova shelve-offload' command.

The default value of 'shelved_offload_time' is 0(zero),
so VM state becomes 'SHELVED_OFFLOADED' immidiately when you perform 'nova shelve' command.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi

comments.content:
I added "shelved_offload_time=180" to nova.conf for both the controller and compute node, but still saw the VM state became "SHELVED_OFFLOADED" immediately after the "nova shelve" command.

Below is a snippet of the nova-compute.log when the "nova shelve" command is executed:

comments.content:
Have the same behavior in Juno release. The  "shelved_offload_time=180" has been set in nova.conf, but instance went to SHELVED_OFFLOADED state immediately and gave the same result with shelve-offload command:
:~$ nova shelve-offload Inst-bcf7af54-77a9-47c1-9ee2-fd4bac437101
ERROR (Conflict): Cannot 'shelveOffload' while instance is in vm_state shelved_offloaded (HTTP 409) (Request-ID: req-aaead587-6111-407b-b4bf-f2a258d80572)

nova log for instance shelve process - http://paste.openstack.org/show/170618/
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ababich

comments.content: [Expired for OpenStack Compute (nova) because there has been no activity for 60 days.]
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~janitor
